member.name: T:Bond.IO.Unsafe.OutputStream
member.summary: Implements IOutputStream on top of System.Stream

member.name: M:Bond.IO.Unsafe.OutputStream.Flush
member.summary: Flush the buffer to the stream.
member.remarks: Does NOT flush the stream. That may not be advisable unless you know the alignment and transactional behavior of the storage medium, so the caller remains separately responsible for that logic if they need it.
